thread.section_title: Norwegian Air Shuttle omtaler | Kundenes anmeldelser av Norwegian Air Shuttle | www.norwegian.com
thread.title: Emilie
thread.title_full: Norwegian Air Shuttle anmeldt av Emilie

author: Emilie
title: Emilie
text: I've flown with norwegian for many years, and was a loyal customer. However, at recent times my flight is always delayed by at least an hour up to 5 hours. It can not be right that I repeatedly experiencing delays every time I fly with Norwegian. They have unfortunately lost a loyal customer because it seems that they do not intend to do anything about the problem!
